inclusion.criterion: non-metastatic unilateral invasive ER-positive, HER2-negative breast cancer with a primary breast tumor > 2cm by imaging or an axillary lymph node > 2cm by imaging
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: postmenopausal women with age less than 70 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no history of hormone therapy, chemotherapy, breast cancer surgery and radiotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ALT and AST ≤ triple of normal upper limit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: TBIL ≤ 1.5 times of normal upper limit
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: other cancers at the same time or have the history of other cancers except controlled skin basal cell carcinoma or skin squamous cell carcinoma or carcinoma in situ of cervix uterus
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: active infections that were not suitable for chemotherapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: bilateral breast cancers or multifocal breast cancers or inflammatory breast cancers
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of previous treatment with mTOR inhibitors
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: current administration of anti-cancer therapies, or attending other clinical trials
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: special conditions that they cannot understand the written informed consent, such as they are demented or hawkish
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: allergic history or contraindication of any of the interventional drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.
